mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MODI_R2CGL_CONFIG (ID, OPRATORNO, OPERTETIME,WORKSTATUS,RESULTSETID, RESULTSETNAME, ISDEL) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opratorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate, 0, #{resultSetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{resultSetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},0)

INSERT INTO MODI_R2CGL_CONFIG_col (CONFIGID, PAGEBYNAME, PAGEBYENAME, ENAME, CNAME, ORDERID) values ( #{configId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pagebyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{pagebyename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
